price: As for those whom We gave the Scripture before this [Qur’an], they[24] do believe in it.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ هُم بِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: [24] i.e., the sincere believers among the People of the Book.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
